references.paper_title: Mastering the game of Go with deep neural networks and tree search
references.reason: This paper introduced AlphaGo, a groundbreaking AI system that demonstrated the power of combining deep learning with Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS), which is a core component of ALPHALLM.
This book provides a comprehensive introduction to reinforcement learning (RL), the foundation for the self-improvement loop in ALPHALLM.

references.paper_title: Training verifiers to solve math word problems
references.reason: This paper introduced the GSM8K dataset, a key benchmark used for evaluating ALPHALLM's performance in mathematical reasoning tasks.

references.paper_title: Llama 2: Open foundation and fine-tuned chat models
references.reason: This paper introduced Llama 2, a large language model (LLM) used as a base model for ALPHALLM.
This paper explored self-correction and self-learning strategies in LLMs, which are directly relevant to ALPHALLM's self-improvement approach.
